section.heading: Exemptions.
section.text: The provisions of this subchapter shall not apply to the following:

para.text: Occasional babysitting in a babysitter’s home for the children of one family;
Care furnished in places of worship during religious services;
Care given by an individual who is related to the child, infant, or toddler;

Child development facilities operated by the federal government on federal government property; however, a private child care provider utilizing space in or on federal government property is not exempt unless federal law specifically exempts the facility from the District’s regulatory authority; or
Pre-kindergarten education programs licensed pursuant to Chapter 2A of Title 38.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 17-202, in par. (4), deleted “or” from the end; in par. (5), substituted “; or” for a period at the end; and added par. (6).
